      • printJustified

        protected static void printJustified(GenericPrinter output,
                  String value,
                  int length)
        Send a string to an output device, inserting line breaks at the first space after a specified number of characters on the line.
        Parameters:
        output - Output device
        value - String to be sent to output
        length - Number of characters on a line after which the next space is to be replaced by a line feed.

                      String parameterName,
                      String modeValue)
        Carry out the HTML escaping of a string twice.
        Parameters:
        rs - Result set containing value
        parameterName - Name of column in result set
        modeValue - Type of processing for escaping
        Returns:
        Escaped string

      • escapeHTML

        public static String escapeHTML(String value,
                String modeValue)
        Replace less than signs, greater than signs, and ampersands in a string with their HTML representations.

        If mode is TEXTAREA or TEXT, do not replace line breaks. When escaping the contents of a TEXTAREA tag, the new line and carriage return characters should remain unchanged so that they are properly represented in the form.

        Parameters:
        value - String to be modified
        modeValue - Mode of operation
        Returns:
        Modified string

      • escapeHTML

        public static String escapeHTML(ResultSet rs,
                String parameterName,
                String mode)
        Processes special characters in HTML code so that it will not be interpreted by browser as commands.

        Uses @{link escapeHTML(String, String).

        Parameters:
        rs - Result set containing value.
        parameterName - Name of column containing value
        mode - Mode of processing to be used
        Returns:
        Escaped string

      • escapeHTML

        public static String escapeHTML(ResultSet rs,
                String parameterName)
        Processes special characters in HTML code so that it will not be interpreted by browser as commands.

        Uses @{link escapeHTML(String).

        Parameters:
        rs - Result set containing value.
        parameterName - Name of column containing value
        Returns:
        Escaped string
